mockups.content:
# RF Signal Analyzer UI/UX Mockups

Based on the masterplan and user sketch, I'll create detailed UI/UX mockups for the main screens of the RF Signal Analyzer application. These mockups are designed with the target audience in mind - research scientists and engineers with technical expertise in RF signals.

## 1. Dashboard / Home Screen

**Purpose:** The dashboard serves as the entry point to the application, providing quick access to recently analyzed datasets, saved patterns, and core functionality. It gives users an overview of their work and easy navigation to all features.

```svg
<svg width="800" height="600" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="800" height="600" fill="#f5f7fa" />
  
  <!-- Top Navigation Bar -->
  <rect width="800" height="60" fill="#1a73e8" />
  <text x="30" y="38" font-family="Arial" font-size="22" font-weight="bold" fill="white">RF Signal Analyzer</text>
  
  <!-- Navigation Icons -->
  <circle cx="700" cy="30" r="15" fill="white" fill-opacity="0.2" />
  <text x="700" y="36" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">?</text>
  
  <circle cx="740" cy="30" r="15" fill="white" fill-opacity="0.2" />
  <text x="740" y="36" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">⚙</text>
  
  <circle cx="780" cy="30" r="15" fill="white" fill-opacity="0.2" />
  <text x="780" y="35" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">👤</text>
  
  <!-- Left Sidebar -->
  <rect x="0" y="60" width="200" height="540" fill="#ffffff" />
  <rect x="0" y="60" width="200" height="540" fill="#f0f4f8" />
  
  <!-- Sidebar Menu Items -->
  <rect x="15" y="100" width="170" height="40" rx="5" fill="#1a73e8" />
  <text x="45" y="125" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="white">Dashboard</text>
  <text x="25" y="125" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="white">📊</text>
  
  <rect x="15" y="150" width="170" height="40" rx="5" fill="transparent" />
  <text x="45" y="175" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">Data Import</text>
  <text x="25" y="175" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">📁</text>
  
  <rect x="15" y="200" width="170" height="40" rx="5" fill="transparent" />
  <text x="45" y="225" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">Signal Analysis</text>
  <text x="25" y="225" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">📈</text>
  
  <rect x="15" y="250" width="170" height="40" rx="5" fill="transparent" />
  <text x="45" y="275" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">Pattern Library</text>
  <text x="25" y="275" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">🔍</text>
  
  <rect x="15" y="300" width="170" height="40" rx="5" fill="transparent" />
  <text x="45" y="325" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">Reports</text>
  <text x="25" y="325" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">📄</text>
  
  <!-- Main Content Area -->
  <rect x="220" y="80" width="560" height="80" rx="5" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#e0e6ed" stroke-width="1" />
  <text x="250" y="115" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Welcome, Dr. Smith</text>
  <text x="250" y="140" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#666">Last login: Today, 09:45 AM</text>
  
  <!-- Quick Actions -->
  <rect x="220" y="180" width="270" height="150" rx="5" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#e0e6ed" stroke-width="1" />
  <text x="240" y="210" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Quick Actions</text>
  
  <rect x="240" y="230" width="230" height="40" rx="20" fill="#1a73e8" />
  <text x="355" y="255" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Import New Dataset</text>
  
  <rect x="240" y="280" width="230" height="40" rx="20" fill="#34a853" />
  <text x="355" y="305" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Create New Analysis</text>
  
  <!-- Recent Datasets -->
  <rect x="510" y="180" width="270" height="150" rx="5" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#e0e6ed" stroke-width="1" />
  <text x="530" y="210" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Recent Datasets</text>
  
  <text x="530" y="240" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">RF_Lab_20230615.csv</text>
  <text x="710" y="240" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#666" text-anchor="end">2 days ago</text>
  
  <text x="530" y="270" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">Station_7_Data.xls</text>
  <text x="710" y="270" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#666" text-anchor="end">1 week ago</text>
  
  <text x="530" y="300" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">Experiment_RF_001.csv</text>
  <text x="710" y="300" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#666" text-anchor="end">2 weeks ago</text>
  
  <!-- Recent Analyses -->
  <rect x="220" y="350" width="560" height="230" rx="5" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#e0e6ed" stroke-width="1" />
  <text x="240" y="380" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Recent Analyses</text>
  
  <!-- Mini Charts -->
  <rect x="240" y="400" width="160" height="100" rx="5" fill="#f8f9fa" stroke="#e0e6ed" stroke-width="1" />
  <path d="M250,480 Q270,430 290,470 T330,440 T370,460 T390,420" stroke="#1a73e8" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
  <text x="250" y="420" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">RF_Lab Analysis</text>
  <text x="380" y="420" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="#666" text-anchor="end">6 outliers</text>
  
  <rect x="420" y="400" width="160" height="100" rx="5" fill="#f8f9fa" stroke="#e0e6ed" stroke-width="1" />
  <path d="M430,480 Q450,450 470,470 T510,430 T550,480" stroke="#ea4335" stroke-width="2" fill="none" />
  <text x="430" y="420" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">Station 7 Analysis</text>
  <text x="560" y="420" font-family="Arial" font-size="10" fill="#666" text-anchor="end">3 outliers</text>
  
  <rect x="240" y="510" width="160" height="50" rx="5" fill="#f8f9fa" stroke="#e0e6ed" stroke-width="1" />
  <text x="250" y="540" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">View All Analyses</text>
  <text x="380" y="540" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#1a73e8" text-anchor="end">→</text>
  
  <rect x="420" y="510" width="160" height="50" rx="5" fill="#f8f9fa" stroke="#e0e6ed" stroke-width="1" />
  <text x="430" y="540" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#333">Saved Patterns</text>
  <text x="560" y="540" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#1a73e8" text-anchor="end">→</text>
</svg>
```

## 2. Data Import Screen

**Purpose:** This screen allows users to upload and manage their RF signal data files. It provides options for importing CSV and XLS files, validates the data format, and displays a preview before proceeding to analysis.

```svg
<svg width="800" height="600" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="800" height="600" fill="#f5f7fa" />
  
  <!-- Top Navigation Bar -->
  <rect width="800" height="60" fill="#1a73e8" />
  <text x="30" y="38" font-family="Arial" font-size="22" font-weight="bold" fill="white">RF Signal Analyzer</text>
  
  <!-- Navigation Icons -->
  <circle cx="700" cy="30" r="15" fill="white" fill-opacity="0.2" />
  <text x="700" y="36" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">?</text>
  
  <circle cx="740" cy="30" r="15" fill="white" fill-opacity="0.2" />
  <text x="740" y="36" font-family="Arial" font-size="18" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">⚙</text>
  
  <circle cx="780" cy="30" r="15" fill="white" fill-opacity="0.2" />
  <text x="780" y="35" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">👤</text>
  
  <!-- Left Sidebar -->
  <rect x="0" y="60" width="200" height="540" fill="#ffffff" />
  <rect x="0" y="60" width="200" height="540" fill="#f0f4f8" />
  
  <!-- Sidebar Menu Items -->
  <rect x="15" y="100" width="170" height="40" rx="5" fill="transparent" />
  <text x="45" y="125" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">Dashboard</text>
  <text x="25" y="125" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">📊</text>
  
  <rect x="15" y="150" width="170" height="40" rx="5" fill="#1a73e8" />
  <text x="45" y="175" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="white">Data Import</text>
  <text x="25" y="175" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="white">📁</text>
  
  <rect x="15" y="200" width="170" height="40" rx="5" fill="transparent" />
  <text x="45" y="225" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">Signal Analysis</text>
  <text x="25" y="225" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">📈</text>
  
  <rect x="15" y="250" width="170" height="40" rx="5" fill="transparent" />
  <text x="45" y="275" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">Pattern Library</text>
  <text x="25" y="275" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">🔍</text>
  
  <rect x="15" y="300" width="170" height="40" rx="5" fill="transparent" />
  <text x="45" y="325" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">Reports</text>
  <text x="25" y="325" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">📄</text>
  
  <!-- Main Content Area -->
  <rect x="220" y="80" width="560" height="60" rx="5" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#e0e6ed" stroke-width="1" />
  <text x="250" y="120" font-family="Arial" font-size="20" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Data Import</text>
  
  <!-- Upload Area -->
  <rect x="220" y="160" width="560" height="180" rx="5" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#e0e6ed" stroke-width="1" />
  
  <!-- Dashed Upload Box -->
  <rect x="270" y="190" width="460" height="120" rx="5" stroke="#1a73e8" stroke-width="2" stroke-dasharray="5,5" fill="#f0f4f8" fill-opacity="0.5" />
  <text x="500" y="230" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" fill="#1a73e8" text-anchor="middle">Drag and drop your RF signal data files here</text>
  <text x="500" y="260" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#666" text-anchor="middle">Supported formats: CSV, XLS</text>
  <rect x="425" y="280" width="150" height="40" rx="20" fill="#1a73e8" />
  <text x="500" y="305" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="white" text-anchor="middle">Browse Files</text>
  
  <!-- File Format Settings -->
  <rect x="220" y="360" width="270" height="220" rx="5" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#e0e6ed" stroke-width="1" />
  <text x="240" y="390" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">File Format Settings</text>
  
  <!-- Settings Form -->
  <text x="240" y="425" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">Delimiter:</text>
  <rect x="240" y="435" width="230" height="30" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#ccc" />
  <text x="250" y="455" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">Comma (,)</text>
  <text x="455" y="455" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#666">▼</text>
  
  <text x="240" y="485" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">Header Row:</text>
  <rect x="240" y="495" width="230" height="30" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#ccc" />
  <text x="250" y="515" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">Yes (First row)</text>
  <text x="455" y="515" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#666">▼</text>
  
  <text x="240" y="545" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">Decimal Separator:</text>
  <rect x="240" y="555" width="230" height="30" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#ccc" />
  <text x="250" y="575" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">Period (.)</text>
  <text x="455" y="575" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#666">▼</text>
  
  <!-- Recent Uploads -->
  <rect x="510" y="360" width="270" height="220" rx="5" fill="#ffffff" stroke="#e0e6ed" stroke-width="1" />
  <text x="530" y="390" font-family="Arial" font-size="16" font-weight="bold" fill="#333">Recent Uploads</text>
  
  <!-- Recent Files List -->
  <rect x="530" y="410" width="230" height="40" rx="4" fill="#f8f9fa" />
  <text x="550" y="435" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">RF_Lab_20230615.csv</text>
  <text x="740" y="435" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#666" text-anchor="end">→</text>
  
  <rect x="530" y="460" width="230" height="40" rx="4" fill="#f8f9fa" />
  <text x="550" y="485" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">Station_7_Data.xls</text>
  <text x="740" y="485" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#666" text-anchor="end">→</text>
  
  <rect x="530" y="510" width="230" height="40" rx="4" fill="#f8f9fa" />
  <text x="550" y="535" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#333">Experiment_RF_001.csv</text>
  <text x="740" y="535" font-family="Arial" font-size="12" fill="#666" text-anchor="end">→</text>
  
  <!-- View All Link -->
  <text x="740" y="570" font-family="Arial" font-size="14" fill="#1a73e8" text-anchor="end">View All</text>
</svg>
```

## 3. Signal Analysis Screen

**Purpose:** This screen is the core of the application, where users can visualize RF signals, detect peaks, and identify outliers. It provides interactive tools for manipulating the visualization and customizing the analysis parameters.

```svg
<svg width="800" height="600" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <!-- Background -->
  <rect width="800" height="600" fill="#f5f7fa" />
  
  <!-- Top Navigation Bar -->
  <rect width="800" height="60" fill="#1a73e8" />
  <text x="30" y="38" font-family="Arial" font-size="22" font-weight="bold" fill="white">RF Signal Analyzer</text>
  
  <!-- Navigation Icons -->
  <circle cx="700" cy="30" r="15" fill="white" fill-opacity
